MAN.TITLE: ROOTS

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : polynomial with real or complex coefficients

DESCRIPTION.P: x=roots(p) returns in the complex vector x the roots of the polynomial p. Degree of p must be <=100.

MAN.EXAMPLE: p=poly([0,10,1+%i,1-%i],'x'); roots(p) A=rand(3,3);roots(poly(A,'x')) // Evals by characteristic polynomial spec(A)
